metadata.synopsis: PAD discussing the Colony, how eerie it is, and reflecting on the (similar) nautiloid at the beginning of the game.Started through COL_Entrance_VBFor Wyll: discussing either his mission to save his father or Mizora.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony using the debugbook:- If you come through the main entrance, walk into the main corridor- If you come through the Necromancer's Room, walk to the main entrance- To trigger Wyll's nodes:Set HAV_Florrick_Event_WyllPresent_5763b529-e86f-7674-c385-5cfedf4ce556 or TWN_Wyll_State_MizorasCaptureWyllPresent_95c16d66-905f-ca29-f4ec-634a363d0e80and enter the triggers as Wyll

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I wager that devil I'm meant to rescue's somewhere near.
0.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel line: teh-LA TAHV-key (spirits guide me)

2.speaker: Player
2.text: I'll spot my father too, with any luck.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: All of this, sitting beneath Moonrise. For how long? And how deep does it go?
1.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel line: teh-LA TAHV-key (spirits guide me)

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Your father too, if our fortunes are so kind.
